committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for the purpose of adding a population-density factor to the definition of urban county currently utilized in such title.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to add a population-density factor to the definition of urban county.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for the purpose of adding a population-density factor to the definition of urban county currently utilized in such title.
